title: When you perform an epic fail, and you sit there hoping nobody saw it.

replies.body: ... Mainly when you pressed {{summoner:4}}  by a mistake.

We have all been there.
http://gifrific.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/Swing-Jump-Fail.gif
how deep is that water? she just disapeared{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
It's a portal to the Void.
{{champion:161}} Can confirm because.......reasons
Happened after a week of playing {{champion:35}} and {{champion:27}} exclusively.
Oh, god, I'm a Singed main. Whenever I see a really bad match-up for Singed or I'm mid, I use people with {{summoner:4}} and it is SO awkward to use properly in some situations.

I play Singed with flash.

Ghost can't carry you over walls mang.
But my way out is through the enemy team.

Then there's me, who's epic coordination causes him to be running from a 4v1, and then randomly miss F and shoot a Viktor ult over the wall...

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Mfw I miss Ctrl and go to rank up R at 11 on any champion and randomly ult.

Also when you walk up to a wall and think the flash will go over but doesn't because you accidentally clicked the other side of the wall and the game started pathing you out...

I accidentally click flash only when I think the text box is open and it isn't. Which is sadly often. No wonder I'm bronze...
Or you're getting reamed in the butt by the enemy team and you try to flash over a wall only to have everyone see you flash in flash and die a quick, painful, embarrassing, honorless death.
Or when you accidentaly don't press it. I have done this many times with {{champion:3}} trying to flash ult and ended up just using it uselessly and my team losing the fight.

Thats when I bust out the cute Ahri gifs.

https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-PyjVIGgt1PY/VlGvIPsNvPI/AAAAAAAAa6I/vlbuGvKqxIE/w426-h354/2015%2B-%2B1

I must study this for scientific purposes.
https://media.giphy.com/media/ktAQNsUfigR1K/giphy.gif
http://memearchive.net/animooted.com/original/38.gif
owo...............*Backs away slowly*

Honestly where do you guys find these? The hell?

Do you like spend 30 minutes searching up the most approriate gif but it also has to be extremely original?
Only when i'm bored

What can you know about cute?

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/2101cf211de0b8b284347e1d38f7749a.gif
I just noticed his, umm, unnoticeables...
Family jewels?
wat D:
I imagine Laughing Fish as that guy who has his phone out ready to show to his friends all the good features he found on Ifunny since the last time they saw each other.
https://media.giphy.com/media/Zd8UGlMtQjSUg/giphy.gif
My favorite epic fail is when i accidentally ult when putting down a ward.  Though it's netted me one kill on Lux.

Yep, I've gone to ward a brush multiple times as Malphite only to ult into a very startled jungler.  When it results in a kill I'm sure they're thinking "screw that, I'm not ganking that lane again.  That guy has eyes in the back of his head."  When really its me just being bad.
I do that all the time I fat finger my R key all the damn time.
Nothing better than going to ward as {{champion:12}} , getting to the bush and then ulting for no reason.
Or when you're aiming your ult as lux and you realize you can't get it there and accidentally let the ult go... So you ult at nothing.
{{champion:4}}  When you gold card the minion instead of your low health laner...
I have a habit of immediately typing "NO ONE SAW THAT", an unfortunate habit really, leads people to figuring out what they didn't see if they choose to Tab. God I hate Spell Timers sometimes.
Seriously if you really don't want anyone to know don't type anything. Today, i accidentally pressed D to flash while standing next to a guy but he said nothing cuz he was afk i guess.

happens all the time on my Syndra...went for that perfect 5 man stun, they were lined up perfectly... i dropped my ball, E'd... but as the E was going off i meant to pick up a minion and throw it

Yeah, ball went up, wave went out, and then i was stareing at a 5 man team in my face with no escape options

Man, just yesterday I was Darius going against a Rengar top doing pre-made 5's. I like to go into the bushes and cheese for the First Blood.

 But he had the same mindset... 
He jumped me first to my surprise. I ended up missing 2 Q's and canceling an auto.

He died and gave me the heal that saved me from his ignite with 4Hp. I told him I didn't deserve that kill!! 

Everyone on my team saw it since it was before the minions spawned...

I had a game where both me and the opposing top laner started lane in each others lane bush and I really don't know how it happened.....was extremely awkward and we just kind of high fived as we walked back to our appropriate sides when minions hit the middle.

Big fight broke out at the dragon, like 3 enemies was low enough to be 1 shot by my ult as ap ezreal. i e W Q in to do a huge damage to the remaining two and then i ulted backwards cause my mouse moved backwards at the last second.an then i got cced an died. it made me cri.
